mapper.update: update teaching set studycheck=#{studycheck} where cno=#{cno} and t_no=#{t_no}
update teaching set studyplan=#{studyplan} where cno=#{cno}
mapper.select: select studyplan,studycheck from teaching where t_no=#{t_no}
select DISTINCT tc.base_no,tc.cno,tc.cname,tc.term,t.studyplan from traincourse tc,teaching t where tc.cno=t.cno and base_no=#{base_no}
select DISTINCT tc.base_no,tc.cno,tc.cname,tc.term,t.studyplan from traincourse tc,teaching t where tc.cno=t.cno and base_no=#{base_no} limit ${page},${pagesize}
select DISTINCT tc.base_no,t.base_class from traincourse tc,teaching t where t.cno=tc.cno and base_no=#{base_no}
select distinct tc.cno,tc.cname,tc.term,t.studyplan from traincourse tc,teaching t where t.cno=tc.cno and tc.cno=#{cno}
select tc.cno,tc.cname,tc.term,t.base_class,t.studycheck from traincourse tc,teaching t where t.cno=tc.cno and tc.cno=#{cno} and t.base_class=#{base_class}
select b.base_no,t.base_class from baseteacher b,teaching t where b.t_no=t.t_no and t.t_no=#{t_no}
